CompanyDescription: Fidus Investment Corporation, a Maryland Corporation, operates as an externally managed business development company ("BDC") under the Investment Company Act of 1940 ("1940 Act"). FIC completed its initial public offering, or IPO, in June 2011. In addition, FIC has elected to be treated as a regulated investment company ("RIC") under Subchapter M of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the "Code"). As of December 31, 2019, our shares were listed on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the symbol "FDUS." FIC may make investments directly or through its three wholly-owned investment company subsidiaries, Fidus Mezzanine Capital, L.P. ("Fund I"), Fidus Mezzanine Capital II, L.P. ("Fund II") and Fidus Mezzanine Capital III, L.P. ("Fund III")(collectively Fund I, Fund II and Fund III are referred to as the "Funds"). Fidus Investment GP, LLC, the general partner of the Funds, is also a wholly owned subsidiary of FIC. The Funds are licensed by the U.S.  ... More ...
